color: p-4 rounded border border-solid border-gray-400 shadow-lg

title.class: dark:border-gray-600 dark:text-sky-400 pb-2 uppercase border-0 border-stone-200 border-solid

link.class: flex flex-row intems-center cursor-pointer block text-gray-600 dark:text-gray-400

label: block mb-1 font-sans text-sm antialiased font-semibold leading-relaxed tracking-normal text-blue-gray-800

input.class: w-full peer placeholder-gray-400 bg-transparent text-blue-gray-700 font-sans font-normal outline outline-0 focus:outline-0 disabled:bg-blue-gray-50 disabled:border-0 transition-all border focus:border text-sm px-2 py-2 rounded-[7px] border-blue-gray-200 focus:border-blue-200

buttons.submit: w-full cursor-pointer text-white bg-gradient-to-r from-green-400 via-green-500 to-green-600 hover:bg-gradient-to-br focus:ring-4 focus:outline-none focus:ring-green-300 dark:focus:ring-green-800 shadow-lg shadow-green-500/50 dark:shadow-lg dark:shadow-green-800/80 font-medium rounded-lg text-sm px-4 py-1 text-center
